name: Deep Learning Leading Research Engineer (3D computer vision project)
description:
We at Samsung AI Center are looking for a Deep Learning Leading Research Engineer for a 3D computer vision project.

Our main focus is 3D computer vision, with topics including single-view and multi-view 3D reconstruction, depth sensor processing, 2D and 3D object detection, and visual analytics. We are working on applied research and outcomes of our work include proof-of-concept applications, research papers on top conferences and patent applications.

GitHub with codes for our published papers: https://github.com/saic-vul

Responsibilities:

  • Leading research to develop new computer vision algorithms
  • Supervision of 1-3 junior or middle research engineers
  • Implementing algorithms in Python, using various frameworks and libraries, following the specified APIs for code integration with other modules
  • Writing papers for the world's leading computer vision conferences
  • Preparation of materials for patent applications
  • Contributing to Proof-of-Concepts and demo applications
  • Writing technical reports and presenting results to colleagues or a broader audience

Requirements:

  • 5+ years in computer vision algorithms
  • 3+ years in neural networks implementation, training and debugging experience
  • Familiarity with modern trends and latest achievements in the field
  • Strong programming skills (Python) and knowledge of standard algorithm structures and data structures
  • Ability to quickly read a scientific paper and understand the main ideas and results

As a plus:

  • PhD degree
  • Publications at CV/ML conferences
  • Competitive ML achievements, e.g. Kaggle
  • Experience is R&D supervision
  • Experience in 3D reconstruction, 3D modelling, object detection, image generation, GANs, computer graphics
  • Experience in contribution to IT products and services
  • С++ knowledge
  • Experience in multi-GPU model training, using GPU clouds
  • Experience in mobile development & optimization of CNN for mobile

Work conditions:

  • Great team with track record of papers on top conferences
  • Challenging research & engineering tasks at the cutting edge of the modern computer vision
  • Nice office in 2 minutes from Belorusskaya Circle Line
  • Competitive salary
  • Corporate lunches
  • Medical and life insurance.
  • 7 days of paid sick leaves (without sick leave certificate)
  • Corporate discount on company good
  • Flexible working time
  • Full compliance with Russian Labor Code
  • Fitness room, shower, partial fitness compensation
  • Company compensates relocation and interview expenses

About us:

  • Samsung AI Center – Moscow has been founded in 2018
  • We are sitting in White Square business center
  • We currently have three labs (Visual Understanding, Multimodal Data Analysis, Machine Learning)
  • …and many projects on such topics as:
    • Generation of photorealistic human avatars
    • Point clouds-based 3D image and video synthesis
    • Techniques for image manipulation using generative networks
    • Training neural networks using Bayesian methodsCreation of multi-agent systems
    • Single-view and multi-view 3D reconstruction
    • Localization and navigation using 3D vision
    • And more!
  • Over past three years, our researchers have published more than 30 papers at the world's best conferences on computer vision and machine learning, including CVPR, ICCV / ECCV, NeurIPS, ICML, ICLR, IROS, WACV and others
